text: Yanks is a 1979 American British German World War II romantic drama movie directed by John Schlesinger and stars Richard Gere, Vanessa Redgrave, Rachel Roberts, Lisa Eichhorn and Derek Thompson. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1979 romantic drama movies Category:1979 war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:German romance movies Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in England
title: Yanks
